feed.title: Beyond IP transactions: towards a bitcoin payment protocol

entry.title: Beyond IP transactions: towards a bitcoin payment protocol
entry.summary: Pieter, a member of the Bitcoin community, has shared an idea on GitHub regarding moving away from static Bitcoin addresses as descriptions for transactions. He hopes that this idea can spark discussion and potentially lead to the development of a BIP/BEPS/BFC. Pieter acknowledges that there is still uncertainty surrounding these protocols, so he has posted his proposal in a Gist for others to comment on. This idea could potentially revolutionize the way Bitcoin transactions are described and executed.
